UsageRatableSummary.name: UsageRatableSummary
UsageRatableSummary.description: Represents the aggregation of the usage summaries that are used to calculate the rate at which the overages are charged.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the ratable summary.

AssetId.description: The asset that's associated with the ratable summary.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the ratable period.

ErrorCode.description: The code that represents the error encountered when the ratable summary is rated.

ErrorDescription.description: The error description that corresponds to the error code.

GrantBindingTargetId.description: The record that's associated with the usage ratable summary. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage ratable summary record.

NetUnitRate.description: The rate that's used to calculate the amount for each unit of usage entitlement overage.

NetUnitRateUomId.description: The unit of measure for the net unit rate applied to the overage.

OverageQuantity.description: The quantity of the usage entitlements that were overused.

OverageQuantityUomId.description: The unit of measure that's used for overage quantity.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the usage ratable summary.

RatingDecisionDateTime.description: The date and time when the decision about rating consumption is done.

RatingExecutionIdentifier.description: The ID of the rating service execution that's used to retrieve waterfall logs.

RatingRequestId.description: The ID that invokes the rating service that's used to rate the usage ratable summary.

SourceUsageResourceId.description: The usage resource thatâ€™s rated in tokens when usage ratable summary is created. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the ratable period.

Status.description: The status of the ratable summary.

TierQuantity.description: The quantity that impacts the net unit rate of a usage entitlement.

TierQuantityUomId.description: The unit of measure for the tier quantity.

TotalAmount.description: The total amount after calculating the overage based on the net unit rate.

UsageEntitlementAccountId.description: The usage entitlement account that's associated with the source of the ratable summary.

UsageEntitlementBucketId.description: The usage entitlement bucket that's associated with the source of the ratable summary.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage entitlement bucket.
